item.title: Americano
item.description: Ingredients 45 ml Campari 45 ml Sweet vermouth 45 ml Soda water 1/2 orange slice Instructions Build in rocks glass over ice. Garnish with orange slice.

item.title: Blood and sand
item.description: Ingredients 20 ml Scotch 20 ml Blood Orange juice 20 ml Sweet vermouth 20 ml Cherry Heering orange zest cherry Instructions Shake ingredients. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a flamed orange zest and cherry.

item.title: Boulevardier
item.description: Ingredients 45 ml Bourbon or Rye whisky 15 ml Campari 15 ml Sweet vermouth orange twist Instructions Stir ingredients. Serve in rocks glass on ice. Garnish with orange twist.

item.title: Manhattan
item.description: Ingredients 60 ml Rye whisky or Bourbon 20 ml Sweet vermouth 4 dashes Aromatic bitters cherry Instructions Stir ingredients. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

item.title: Martinez
item.description: Ingredients 45 ml Gin 45 ml Sweet vermouth 5 ml Maraschino liqueur 4 dashes Aromatic bitters lemon twist Instructions Stirred over ice. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

item.title: Negroni
item.description: Ingredients 30 ml Gin 30 ml Campari 45 ml Sweet vermouth 1/2 slice orange Instructions Stir ingredients. Serve in rocks glass over ice. Garnish with orange slice.
